channel.title: Can you please help me with port forwarding (please read)
channel.description:
Hi there im trying to make a runescape private server it runs smoothly till i come to the "PORT FORWARDING" part :( of you know what to write in the things like name and tcp and udp and stuff please reply here is the picture of the form to fill out [img]http://i12.tinypic.com/8akuxlc.png[/img]
when you click the drop arrow to the left of "tcp" you can change "tcp" to "udp" or "tcp/udp" just letting you know :lol: :lol:
here is what i think is right to fill out but i dont know
[img]http://i5.tinypic.com/6jpp0f4.png[/img]
i cant show u my ip adress :P

can you please tell me exactly what to type in the boxes and what to leave blank and stuff

item.title: Can you please help me with port forwarding (please read)
item.dc:creator: @mage_burst mage_burst
item.description:
@mage_burst wrote:

Ok here is what you want to do, If there is a selection where it says tcp and udp, there should be a “both” or something simular, make sure you’r source is on the port u forwarded or eles it won’t work.

Read full topic
